text: "Send In the Clowns" is a song written by Stephen Sondheim for the 1973 musical A Little Night Music."Synopsis" mtishows.com, accessed April 16, 2015 Sondheim wrote the song specifically for Glynis Johns. It became Sondheim's most popular song after Frank Sinatra recorded it in 1973 and Judy Collins' version charted in 1975 and 1977. ==References== Category:1973 songs Category:Frank Sinatra songs
title: Send In the Clowns
